title: She Wore The Name
description: This book is based on the main character, Sarai Chameleon. It is written about how her name means Power! Having been given that name at birth, unbeknownst to Sarai she is walking out her destiny. Whether good or bad, her name should have been chosen more judiciously! Sarai's name comes with an inheritance of wealth, influence, betrayal, lies, curses, voodoo, and so much more.Thank you for choosing She Wore The Name.
author: Theresa A. Ward
